privacy.title: Privacy statement
privacy.section1Body: Welcome to [www.tanzanite.site]. We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your data when you visit our website [www.tanzanite.site] and use our services.
privacy.section2Intro: We may collect the following types of personal information:
privacy.contactDesc: Email address, phone number, shipping/billing address
privacy.transactionDesc: Purchase history, payment details (processed via secure third-party gateways)
privacy.technicalDesc: IP address, browser type, device information, cookies
privacy.useManageAccount: Manage your account and provide customer support
privacy.useImproveSite: Improve website functionality and user experience
privacy.section4Intro: We may share your information with:
privacy.shareServiceProviders: Service Providers: Payment processors, logistics partners, analytics tools
privacy.shareLegalAuthorities: Legal Authorities: When required by law or to protect our rights
privacy.shareBusinessTransfers: Business Transfers: In case of merger, acquisition, or asset sale
privacy.shareNoSale: We do not sell your personal data to third parties.
privacy.section5Intro: We use cookies and similar technologies to:
privacy.cookiesSettings: You can manage cookie settings in your browser.
privacy.section6Body: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
privacy.section7Intro: Depending on your jurisdiction, you may have the right to:
privacy.rightsAccess: Access, correct, or delete your personal data
privacy.rightsContact: To exercise these rights, please contact us.
privacy.section8Body: If you are located outside [Your Country], your data may be transferred to and processed in [Your Country], where data protection laws may differ.
privacy.section9Body: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated effective date.
